short_summary: Snowshed Column Renovations, Mount Revelstoke and Glacier National Park
description: Brief Description: The contract requires the rehabilitation of concrete columns in the Tupper No.2 Snowshed and the Len's Snowshed, the rehabilitation of precast wall panels in the Single Bench Snowshed, and the installation of replacement snowfence timbers or steel channels to replace damaged snowfence timbers at specific highway locations in TransCanada Highway in Glacier National Park for a four (4) month period commencing June 15, 2023 until October 15, 2023.
